workflow.title: Instance Selection and Prototype Based Rules Example 3
workflow.description: Example of Instance selection:(Requires Instance Selection and Prototype Based Rules plugin):Here instance selection is based on All-kNN algorithm. Because the Pro output of any instance selection operator is just an ExampleSet object, so in fact any Learner can be used instead of kNN, like DecisionTree, but in this example the Decision Tree is based on the reduced ExampleSet.
